description: C.J. Ranasinghe Vs Commander of Sri Lanka Navy and four others before Hon. S.U.B. Karalliyadde, J.
parties: C.J. Ranasinghe Vs Commander of Sri Lanka Navy and four others
keywords: Section 122 of the Navy Act, Summary Trial, writ jurisdiction, judicial review, discretionary power on the President, distinction between the review and appeal.
legistation: Navy Act, No. 33 of 1976 as amended, Constitution of the Democratic Republic of Sri Lanka.
